short: Mask prediction is a text processing task where one or more words are masked, or hidden, and the model attempts to predict what word(s) should be in the missing gap. The input for this model requires a string with ‘MASK’ somewhere in it. It will output the predicted word to fill in the gap. Try to special masked version of the AFI movie quotes dataset. For a description of projects using this for research, see the Learn More link above.
